articles.description: All the latest football news and Premier League reaction as Manchester United beat Southampton and Ipswich win at Brighton.
articles.title: Man Utd beat Southampton after late Diallo hat-trick & Brighton win at Ipswich - reaction

articles.description: Live text and radio commentary on day six of the Australian Open featuring Novak Djokovic, Coco Gauff & British number one Jack Draper.
articles.title: Australian Open LIVE: Naomi Osaka, Novak Djokovic, Coco Gauff & GB's Jack Draper - live text and radio commentary

articles.description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland commits his future to the club by signing a new long-term deal.
articles.title: Erling Haaland signs new Manchester City deal until 2034

articles.description: Ash Gardner's century and Alana King's 5-46 sees England slump to a 3-0 defeat in the ODI leg of the Women's Ashes.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: Ash Gardner and Alana King star as hosts seal ODI clean sweep

articles.description: Amad Diallo caps a memorable week with a late hat-trick as Manchester United come from behind to beat Southampton in the Premier League.
articles.title: Amad Diallo: Manchester United winger has 'one of the best weeks in my life'

articles.description: Jacob Fearnley sees his encouraging Australian Open run come to an end against Alexander Zverev in the third round.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Jacob Fearnley loses to Alexander Zverev in Melbourne

articles.description: Top seed Aryna Sabalenka continues her bid for a third consecutive Australian Open title with a straight-sets victory over Denmark's Clara Tauson.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka progresses to round four after battling win

articles.description: Manchester United turn down approach for winger Alejandro Garnacho from Serie A side Napoli.
articles.title: Alejandro Garnacho: Manchester United reject approach from Napoli for Argentina winger

articles.description: American Danielle Collins thanks the fans that heckled her during her second-round victory over Destanee Aiava at the Australian Open  for "paying my bills".
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Danielle Collins thanks fans for "paying my bills" after she was heckled in second-round win

articles.description: Real Madrid need extra time to defeat Celta Vigo and book a place in the quarter-finals of the Copa del Rey.
articles.title: Real Madrid 5-2 Celta Vigo: Hosts need extra-time to reach last eight
